body:
Comment 3: 
I just committed a patch to gccgo that gives this with this program:

foo.go:7:21: error: invalid context-determined non-integer type for left operand of shift
  fmt.Println(1.0 + 1<<s)
                     ^
_Labels changed: added **priority-soon**, **go1.1**, removed **priority-triage**, **go1.1maybe**._
